issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Serde code uses some deprecated methods from org.apache.hadoop.io. package. We should remove them.
fields.summary: Remove usage of deprecated methods from org.apache.hadoop.io package

comments.body:

https://reviews.apache.org/r/1234/
-----------------------------------------------------------

Review request for hive.


Summary
-------

Remove usage of deprecated methods from org.apache.hadoop.io package


This addresses bug HIVE-2122.
    https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-2122


Diffs
-----

Testing
-------


Thanks,

Amareshwari

- Carl
